name: Dropdown
description: Dropdown component for displaying a list of selectable options in a menu. Supports both controlled and uncontrolled modes.

props.name: trigger
props.description: The element that triggers the dropdown

props.name: options
props.description: Options to display. Each has value, label, disabled, icon, secondary, action

props.name: onSelect
props.description: Callback when an option is selected

props.name: hugContents
props.description: If true, menu width hugs contents instead of matching trigger width

examples.title: Basic Dropdown

migrationExamples.mui:
import { Menu, MenuItem } from '@mui/material';
<Menu anchorEl={anchorEl} open={open}>
  <MenuItem>Option 1</MenuItem>
</Menu>
migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI Menu with Dropdown for simplified API

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: Arrow keys navigate options, Enter selects, Escape closes
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Menu state and selected option announced

whenToUse: Select from a list of options
whenNotToUse: For text input with suggestions (use Typeahead)
bestPractices: Use hugContents for action menus with varying widths
